TopicTitle: Linear / square docking port, snapping angle

Articles.Content: I have build interplanetary rocket with reusable booster attached radially at LKO but docking ports make me angry when trying to align engines. In KSP1 or in one of mods there were linear and square docking ports which do this job perfectly. Also there was possibility to snap docking port at set angle or rotate when docked. It would be nice to have this in KSP1.
